explains: adj. 复杂的，令人费解的；令人困惑的

sentences.en: The Earth-Moon system has always been perplexing.
sentences.cn: 地月系统一直令人困惑。

sentences.en: Equally perplexing constituents of Allende are the refractory inclusions: irregular white masses that tend to be larger than chondrules.
sentences.cn: 阿连德陨石中同样令人困惑的成分是那些耐高温的内部物质：往往比陨石球粒要大的不规则白色块状物。

sentences.en: It took years to understand many perplexing diseases.
sentences.cn: 许多疑难病症要耗时多年才能搞明白。
